name: Synergy Shakedown
description:
Synergy Shakedown is a little game I made for Ludum Dare 34!

You play as a leader of a doomed game development team. You'll need to run around and encourage everyone if you want their little cardridges to ship on time.

Ludum Dare 34 had a double theme of "two button controls" and "growing". You can view my entry here. I ranked #110, which I'm happily proud of!

The inspiration for this game came from a benevolent manager I had while working at a large software company. I'm happy with the result, but I wish the gameplay was more interesting. Next time, I hope to make something that's more enjoyable for more than a minute or two.
